duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate the various phases of an engagement, including staff requirements, locations to be visited, job planning, scheduling, etc.
Study and evaluate the internal controls, organization, systems or other appropriate items and prepare or review the audit program or consulting project and time budget
Supervise existing staff members on projects and evaluate work papers to determine compliance with auditing or consulting standards
Review significant audit or consulting findings, financial statement presentation, or other matters within the purview of an accounting or consulting assignment with management
Prepare or review financial statements, notes, schedules, management letters, reports, and other documents for discussion with the client

education_certification.credential: BA or BS in Accounting, Finance, or Business (MBA or MSA preferred)
